greeting.message: What do you want? Don't bother me.
greeting.opt1: Just wanted to ask few questions about this place.

beerRequest.message: Pay for my next beer and I'll talk to you.
beerRequest.opt2: I'll pass, you can buy one yourself.

talkIntro.message: Haha, that's what I'm talking about! Now we can talk.
talkIntro.opt1: The beach is safe for now.
talkIntro.opt3: What can you tell me about this place?
talkIntro.opt4: Do you have any work for me?
talkIntro.opt5: I don't have any more questions, enjoy your drink.

whoAreYou.message: My name is Josh and I'm a local fisherman, my hobby is drinking free beer.
whoAreYou.opt1: I see, a drunk and beggar then.

placeInfo.message: This a tavern. Duh. Buy seriously seems like you're a new one here. This is La Harpar, a fisherman village located on Horseshoe Beach.
placeInfo.opt1: Horseshoe Beach? I didn't see any horses on the way here.

workRequest.message: Work? Here? There is always work to do. We had some animal overpopulation issues on our beach lately. Come back when you kill 50 enemies on Wave 7 in Beach.

warning.message: Oi, mate. You don't want to make enemies here, you're a new face and new faces can disappear overnight here.
warning.opt1: I'm sorry, I got carried away.
warning.opt2: Don't care, you will trip over those chairs before you could catch me, bye...

beachTradeInfo.message: The name comes from the shape of the beach, you donkey. Horseshoe Beach and La Harpar are important trade partners to North Lirold, capital of this region.
beachTradeInfo.opt1: What exactly is La Harpar providing?
beachTradeInfo.opt2: This region? How many regions there are?

goodsInfo.message: We mainly provide various fish and seafood. Also lately we have been overstocked on turtle shells, please go do some work and clear the beach.

regionsInfo.message: There are 4 known regions to us: Southback, Port Stocksmar, Greefic Hill and Saint Nestroud. La Harpas resides in Port Stocksmar.

mountainInfo.message: Well, beyond Greefic Hill there is an uncrossable mountain. Some magical force and unpredictable weather conditions make that place impossible to survive.

failedExplorers.message: Yes, no one who tried came back. Then friends or family members tried to search for those people and they also didn't come back.
failedExplorers.opt1: Interesting. What do you think could be there?
failedExplorers.opt2: Heard enough, I want to sleep tonight.

forestRumors.message: Beats me! People who got close said they could hear chants and howls from the forest that's surrounding the mountain. My feet won't set there anytime soon.

coastClear.message: No. For now the coast is clear.
